description: Sherpa FAUX LIFE! Introducing the star of the show, this sherpa jacket features a half zipper at the front, trendy mock neck and elasticized waistband. No matter the occasion, stand out in this new gem by stylin' it with your fave jeggings and statement accessories. Your name is written all over it!
name: Mock Neck Sherpa Jacket

description: Dressed to a tee. Featuring our signature soft fabric, this t-shirt dress looks awesome paired with a slouchy cardigan and all your fave accessories!
name: T-Shirt Dress

description: Knot just a basic! Featuring a crew neck, short sleeves and knotted front, this super cute tee will have everyone watchin' your every move. With a pair of high rise denim, let this tee do all the talking!
name: Knot Front Tee

description: TOP off every look! Featuring a ribbed fabric, cropped length and stretchy fit, this tube top is all you've been waiting for. Wear this new gem with your fave jeggings and sneakers!
name: Ribbed Tube Top

description: Wrap up the cutest looks! Featuring short sleeves and the prettiest wrap front ever, this tee will have you shinin' from morning to night. Style this new fave with high rise denim or a pretty skirt!
name: Wrap Front Tee

description: Jean queen! Rock every look with these super essential jeggings that feature a high rise and dark wash. Throw on your fave graphic tee, sunnies and kicks. Seriously, you'll look great!
name: High Rise Jegging
